titleStmt.title: By the Mayor, to the Alderman of the Ward of [blank] whereas by an ordinance entitled, an ordinance for the better amending and keeping in repaire the common high-wayes within this nation ...
titleStmt.author: Corporation of London (England). Lord Mayor.
Vyner, Thomas, Sir, 1588-1665.
